marklogic.body: What department of the government is charged with defending the value of the currency? The Federal Reserve is cheerleading 2% + inflation (as they measure it)...with effective inflation more at the 8% level.....chipping away at the value of our currency and making EVERYTHING we import...and we import nearly everything...much more expensive (ie OIL) In 1974, Arthur Burns ..Chairman of the Fed Reserve .... championed wage and price controls when inflation was 4%..... now the Fed Cheers 2% (effective 8%)......look how far we have come! 4% an emergency...2+% now a goal. What happened?. Doing away with the penny will be the biggest inflation move of all time....EVERYTHING will be ROUNDED UP.....to the next nickel level....sounds small...but it wont be.....
